name: Drunk Way Home (ProteCat)
description:
(This was our second project for game jam practice)

The smell of alcohol gradually fading makes you wonder whether you're getting close to your limit. So, you decided to go home. However, the door is locked, so you start searching for the keys.

Wait. Keys?

Credits
Roger Gilbert Fernandi - Game Designer
Angeline Cecilia - 2D Artist
Kensi Chandrawan - Game Designer & Programmer
